ComicInfo.Summary: *Contents* Jack and Damon are Muppets; Damon uses the Remote Control and they change realities. Jack and Damon find themselves returned to the dystopian MTV future. Damon kills Wally and Ellis, altered versions of fellow high school students. Before Damon can imprison Jack, Kojak uses the Remote Control. The trio return to their normal reality and discover that Wally and Ellis have been killed there as well. Jack and Damon witness Wally and Ellis' killer arrested and taken to jail. Jack accidentally uses the Remote Control and the trio arrive in a Saturday Morning Cartoon reality. Damon uses the Remote Control and they find themselves in Mayberry R.F.D.; where they are arrested for fighting. Jack and Damon discover the killer in another Mayberry R.F.D. jail cell.
ComicInfo.Title: Somebody Please Pull The Plug
